      • createLightAccount

        public CreateLightAccount createLightAccount(CreateLightAccountRequest request)
        Create a light account for the given email or social identifier. Light account does not have a password associated this no login and auth tokens are involved.
        Parameters:
        request - Request data to be sent to the server
        Returns:
        Action to be executed asynchronously or synchronously

      • resetPassword

        public ResetPasswordAction resetPassword(ResetPasswordRequest request)
        Reset the password of the account identified by the corresponding 'reset password token' given in the requestparameters. This token mentioned above can be found in the email send as a result of handleResetPassword. This method can be used upgrade a light account to a full account.
        Parameters:
        request - Request data to be sent to the server
        Returns:
        Action to be executed asynchronously or synchronously

      • emailLookUp

        public EmailLookUp emailLookUp(EmailLookUpRequest request)
        Check if an email exists in the SCV DB or not. Will also return the eUCI, eUCI as condition code parameters if the email lookup was successful.
        Parameters:
        request - Request data to be sent to the server
        Returns:

      • refreshAuthToken

        public boolean refreshAuthToken(<any> callback)
        Asynchronously refreshes the auth token of the user account. Refresh token is needed for this action. If it's missing or if multiple accounts are found then callback's onError() method is called.
        Returns:
        true if the token refresh request was sent

      • refreshAuthToken

        public java.lang.String refreshAuthToken()
                                  throws AuthenticationException
        Synchronously refreshes the auth token of the user account. Refresh token is needed for this action. If it's missing then null is returned.
        Returns:
        auth token
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException

      • isValidUserSession

        public boolean isValidUserSession()
        Check if a user is currently logged in. A user is considered logged when an accessToken is stored and it has a valid expiry time. Consider that an stored token might have been revoked from outside the SDK, so the
        Returns:
        true if there is a user currently logged in or false if not

      • lookUpConsentMasterData

        public LookUpMasterData lookUpConsentMasterData(java.lang.String consentType,
                                                java.lang.String legalEntityCode,
                                                java.lang.String language,
                                                java.lang.String isoA2Code)
        Look up master data with the type LookUpMasterDataRequest#CONSENT_VERSION.
        Parameters:
        consentType - Possible values allowed are AMF, ASF, ABF,ADF
        legalEntityCode - Valid code for legal entity in SCV
        language - Valid ISO country code as present in SCV database
        isoA2Code - The ISO 3166-A2 code of the country of the site
        Returns:
        look up master data action
        See Also:
        Country & Language Codes for Consent Master Data Lookup
